005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.info;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.BindingException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.IValuedMutable;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
015
016public interface IFeatureScalarItemValueHandler
017    extends IItemValueHandler<Object>, IValuedMutable {
018
019  /**
020   * Apply the string value.
021   * <p>
022   * This first parses the value using the underlying data type implementation and
023   * then applies the parsed value.
024   *
025   * @param parent
026   *          the parent object to apply the value to
027   * @param text
028   *          the value to parse
029   * @throws IllegalArgumentException
030   *           if the text was malformed
031   * @see #getJavaTypeAdapter()
032   */
033  default void setValue(@NonNull Object parent, @NonNull String text) {
034    Object item = getValueFromString(text);
035    setValue(parent, item);
036  }
037
038  @Nullable
039  default String toStringFromItem(@NonNull Object parent) {
040    Object item = getValue(parent);
041    return item == null ? null : getJavaTypeAdapter().asString(item);
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Parse a string value using the underlying data type implementation.
046   *
047   * @param text
048   *          the value to parse
049   * @return the parsed value
050   * @throws IllegalArgumentException
051   *           if the text was malformed
052   * @see #getJavaTypeAdapter()
053   */
054  default Object getValueFromString(@NonNull String text) {
055    return getJavaTypeAdapter().parse(text);
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Get the data type adapter supporting the scalar value.
060   *
061   * @return the data type adapter
062   */
063  @NonNull
064  IDataTypeAdapter<?> getJavaTypeAdapter();
065
066  @Override
067  default Object deepCopyItem(Object source, IBoundObject parentInstance) throws BindingException {
068    return getJavaTypeAdapter().copy(source);
069  }
070}
